place_name: Knowledge Perk Coffee Company | Rock Hill
place_description:
Rock Hill, South Carolina's original hometown coffee roaster! Come relax in our beautiful flagship café with indoor and outdoor seating. We offer fresh roasted coffee, cold brew, a full range of expert espresso beverages, seasonal drink menu, and a variety of sweet and savory pastry and bagel creations.
All coffee is roasted in house and is available onsite or via our website for retail purchase. We have immersive, engaging programs and events for our community to grow in their knowledge and enjoyment of coffee. You can also rent out our café for your next event, or we can come to you with our coffee bus or catering options!
Give us a call or visit our website for more information. Better yet, drop by to see us in person!

reviews_data.review_text:
Chairs are uncomfortable,
With all due respect to the reply; the coffee was great. As so I will adjust my review to better reflect the entire experience...however the chairs remain uncomfortable and should be thrown off a very tall building.

Came in at an admittedly busy time. Ordered a hot chocolate, nothing complicated. Waited patiently for  over a half hour and watched every one who ordered after us get their snazzy coffees and leave. After asking politely multiple times and being met with attitude from the young girl behind the counter, we asked for a refund. It took another 10 minutes for the staff to figure out how to issue a refund. We will not be back.

*UPDATE* Called and talked to the manager and he was rather dismissive. He seemed to be familiar with the girl with the attitude problem but essentially told me it was "in my head" and "it just seemed like" others were being served ahead of us and we had been forgotten. Pretty much solidified me not giving them another chance. I was hoping the call would change that but NOPE.

Great place to meet up. I'm a little bit of a coffee snob. This coffee is amazing! Great atmosphere, great outdoor area for a little bit warmer weather. Have not tried any of the food for pastries, sure they're great too

Editing a year later: updating from 4 to 5 stars!! I've been in here several times lately over the past few months- each time I've been greeted as I've walked in and I've noticed the baristas asking specific questions about how I would like my coffee which as a a coffee addict I appreciate so much. It seems like service has improved since I last left my review. It's hard for local businesses to thrive in this climate and I appreciate their commitment and hard work to excellence, rock hill is lucky to have them!

We just moved to town not long ago but the first thing I looked at were coffee shops that roasted their own beans so I came upon knowledge perk and have tried it about 7-9 times. Their storefront is gorgeous, the space is beautiful and really a great spot in town- 10/10 for the atmosphere and physical location. However, each time I've been in- no one welcomes you when you arrive and it almost feels like the baristas have been annoyed by my questions or on half of the occasions they've been talking with coworkers while I'm standing there to get my order taken. The to-go service is incredibly fast which is great but  the times I've been in there's been things that were forgotten from my order or sat at the counter for a long time bc I didn't know it was ready. Their drip was incredibly good but the other drinks I've ordered- iced lattes, iced americanos, hot americanos have been lacking I'm not sure if the staff are as trained as you would expect from such a high quality location. I hope great things for this small business and I hope that their baristas grow in knowledge and hospitality.

they dont know how to make coffee. i've been here three times and i always come away disappointed. they seem to concern themselves more with gimmicks than with nailing the fundamentals of making good coffee.

just go to Mado.
I went back to revisit it. It's still good... But not as good as it once was. So I had to bump it down to 4 stars
Best coffee in RH area. Environment is friendly and relaxing. I have enjoyed every visit there and really recommend if you like a good cup of real coffee.

I got the seasonal Christmas Latte and was surprised. I wasn't sure about the cocoanut and macadamia nut mixture but it turned out very good. Their coffee is great without any bitter aftertaste, milk was perfectly foamed and steamed to the right temperature. Definitely recommend.

Visiting SC for the weekend, I bought a bag of natural process Colombia. I requested half of it ground, and not only did the barista accommodate, but heat sealed the rest of my beans without saying a word. The coffee is amazing, strong notes of strawberry/fruity and milk chocolate. Some of the best I've ever brewed, I took a chance on an expensive ($24) bag and the quality absolutely reflects what i paid, but they had more affordable bags as well (~$18) Specialty coffee snobs and coffee lovers will not be disappointed.

I've been coming here for years. Great place for meeting, remote work, or just catching up with friends.
The method in which they take your order, they make your order is different in the fact they don't do 10 orders and get to them, so you will wait in line when it's busy, we'll worth it.
They also have a room you can reserve if you need to have a private meeting.
They have many options, including non-coffee.
Sweet respectful servers, great ambiance, can bring friends with board games, spend fun time , latte was creamy bagels and savory spinach feta pastry was over by 6  pm did have clean washroom
Creamy pour over and yummy ham and cheese turnover.  I went every day off my business trip.
Strong espresso, good lighting, electrical outlets. Great study/work spot

I'm new to Rock Hill.  One of the things I like to do when I move to a new place is find a local coffee house that I can enjoy a good conversation with the staff and have a great place to relax.  The coffee is great.  I had asked what is good.  I was recommended a bourbon latte that is seasonal.  They even were able to do it with oat milk.  It was delivered to me quickly and this has become my favorite for the moment.

The music and the vibe is just right.  The music is a good selection and it is not obnoxious.  It is loud enough to enjoy but quiet enough for me and my boyfriend to be able to talk and relax.  I like to read legal decisions and I was able to concentrate, which is a plus.  I like that there is Wi-Fi and that it works.

I've read other reviews that people have had to wait to for service.  I've not experienced it in the trips that I've had.  I was instantly greeted and even had a chance for good conversation.  I also appreciate the hours of operation.  I like to have a coffee later in the day and this place was able to deliver.

One of my all time favorite coffee places!  Thank you on a job well done!  I'll continue to return.

I host a Bi-Weekly group called Christian Women in Rock Hill SC (YHWH Latte Ministry), I love the fact that we aren't given ugly looks but encouraged to come back. Many of the baristas know me and the group and we are always greeted! It's very beautiful and the coffee is amazing!!!

To the Owner of knowledge perk! Zoe of Rock Hill is the worst Supervisor. She Hung up on me during an enquiry over the phone a short while ago about mixing up both my husband's and son's order! Never us again after purchasing for years at this establishment. You made a mistake Zoe, own up to it and move along, your hoggish attitude and disrespectful language was really unnecessary. Your stressors must be triggering your unprofessionalism at another person's establishment!

I came to do some work on my laptop and get a coffee. There is a variety of seating options including 2 couch/lounge areas, high top 8 person community tables, several 2 person seated tables, and some outdoor uncovered seating on the patio. Great for remote work, studying, or catching up with a friend. Tons of outlets to charge your devices. Good WiFi, no password needed.
Two choices on drip coffee and the medium roast is above average. Overall the vibes are cozy, inviting, and productive if working. They were playing some 90s classics at a reasonable volume, songs like Just by Radiohead and Tonight, Tonight by Smashing Pumpkins as I was writing this. Fantastic.

Staff is friendly and the coffee is great. But they are so unorganized and waiting almost 20 minutes for coffee is unreasonable. If the place is empty, it will be a great experience. But if it's busy, walk back out. Staff is great but they kept overlapping each other and it looked so hectic. This was not one day but multiple days of being almost late by stopping by. I support local so I hope they get it together. Great location.
Just ordered the seasonal Apple Pie Chai and it's amazing! Talk about bringing the taste of the season! Will be ordering this until they pry it away from me!

Just riding through the area on my Vespa and saw several people sitting outside and I saw a coffee sign.  It was Saturday morning and I was thirsty. Nice open space and very friendly staff.  Not much for food here so come for the coffee.  I tried a blended (frozen) drink and I was impressed. Not bitter and a bit sweet.  I'll be back to try other brews.

Love the atmosphere of this coffee shop. Service was excellent and personable. I love the special attention given to making the coffee drinks. I drove outnof my way home to get a cup of coffee and glad i.chisenthis spot.

Not a good customer service experience. No staff were around when I arrived--went towards the back to find anyone for service. Person who prepared me drink didn't wash her hands between touching cleaning supplies and handling my drink. Staff ignored other customers coming in, until customers asked for help. Not planning on returning for another visit.
Awesome place for coffee. The coffee itself, cold or hot, seems way better than starbucks, in my opinion. I prefer hot lattes, and these are honestly the best I've had. 10/10 for coffee!

Very tasty! I got an iced americano and Babe got cold brew. They have a drink called fire on ice. She said "it's more of an experience." 4 oz drink with vanilla on the bottom, then half and half, then a double shot...you drink it like a shot and it's hot at first and then cold. Never heard of such a thing but I'm hoping to get back there to try it. We loved the vibe and the outdoor seating.

I went here for a business meet-up. I had the 12 Oz hot chocolate with oat milk. It was so good. The atmosphere is nice. It is a nice hidden secret. I work a few blocks away and did not know this place was here.
I definitely recommend this place.

I asked for a latte and asked if they had whipped cream and they said yes.  A few minutes later when they called out my drink they said they had no whip cream.  Made no mention of giving back the money I paid for it.  Not a good first experience.
Busy..busy place! Great service and excellent coffee choices!
First time enjoying inside the actual location versus ordering from the truck, thoroughly enjoyed!  Highly recommend trying the iced flight!
My Barista was Will very personable guy. I had the tiramisu iced coffee and it was Amazing

Knowledge Perk Coffee Company is an ideal spot to get your caffeine fix!

I was passing through Rock Hill & I completed a quick Google search on a local spot to grab a latte. Knowledge Perk popped up & looked like the perfect spot. The inside is massive. There's plenty of space to work, hang out, & network. I enjoyed the way they designed the interior to match with the wood panels & brick walls.

The vanilla latte I got was delicious. It was perfectly made. The staff was friendly & chatted with me about the growth of the Rock Hill area.

If I were in the Rock Hill area, I know I'd make this my daily stop!
The owner was so nice and the coffee shop had the best atmosphere. I would highly recommend it and wish I could give more then five stars
Love the hot chocolate and cinnamon roll delicious!! Took spinach feta to go! Love the interior design and atmosphere  service great!
Had the tropical Christmas latte and the eggnog latte. Both had great flavour.

This is my favorite place to come for a business meeting as well as casual dates with friends and my wife. They always have the freshest ground coffee oh, and their two selection is amazing. I also love the low-key, Lo-Fi atmosphere. It is perfect for grinding away and getting work done, especially if you work from home where are an entrepreneur. I used to go to another coffee shop daily that is a major brands, have switched to knowledge perk. Many times they even have a food truck for lunch available

I ordered an iced miel latte, which was good. A tad sweeter than I'm used to but still delicious. The total price for a 24oz iced miel was $7.20, which I thought was expensive (more than I've ever paid anywhere, and I've been to a LOT of coffee shops around the US). They had a $0.15 up-charge for ground cinnamon which I think is a little ridiculous considering cinnamon is so cheap and a drink only requires a little bit. Besides the price, the coffee was good.
Friendly people. Great drinks and food. Awesome atmosphere.  All around nice place
Great vibe.  This place is cool
Chai Tea with Almond milk and cinnamon (southern style)

Mocha was not a mocha but more of a latte with something that tasted like a watery chocolate simple syrup. Automatically set tip at checkout, which made this coffee over 8.00 and that was a shock for a mediocre drink. I'd pay 8.00 and drive out of my way for a good coffee but alas this one would not cut it unfortunately.

Ordered a coffee cake through the ordering system online and thought it would be brought to my table. (Had to get it up instead and was doing important work on my computer) and was told the coffee cake couldn't be warmed.... So it was dry and cold. Never heard of a coffee shop not able to warm up pastries.
Felt like my energy and was wasted.

Love the ambience, but some of the baristas could be a little more ambitious and helpful with special coffee requests. Maybe they just don't know enough about coffee or just wanting you to leave. It is a nice place to hang out with friends for a chat. They do need to up their baked goods/snack/foods game.
friendly staff and great coffee.
This is my favorite place to come for a business meeting as well as casual dates with friends.
Beautiful place.

Absolutely stunning spot with a gorgeous wrap around porch. Perfect for those who are "serious" coffee drinkers! A lot of classic coffee styles and espresso options, even some off the wall stuff. Easy location to get to and there is plenty of parking.
Coffee was delicious, I got a mocha latte. This is a great place for business meetings and I highly recommend you come here! Great local coffee shop
I told the barista I wanted something with a lot of caffeine and caramel and she made me the prefect drink. I wish I could have stayed longer to enjoy the venue, but I'll be back!
We love the atmosphere and the coffee!! Great place to hang out, work, chill...whatever.  Check it out!!
A wide and delightful variety!

Ordered a good ol' cappuccino and after almost 9$ I got a fresh fresh cup of it. I liked it but it's a bit overpriced. I get the 'supply+quality+demand' thing but 9 for a cappuccino? Barely had much pastries to snack on. Will visit again if in the area. It is a very large coffee shop. Rr is clean and no parking issues as it's in the shopping area.
Love this Place!! They always have great coffee and the employees are always nice and helpful. I love trying there seasonal flavors!

We enjoyed a couple of smooth-tasting oat milk lattes in a relaxing and enjoyable environment. A perfect day with the wife of my youth, living and appreciating all that God made her to be while enjoying a great cup of exquisite locally roasted beans.

Coram Deo!
US Army Retired (Big Red One)

Fantastic locally owned coffee shop and roasters in down town Rock Hill! Veteran owned and operated, community oriented and amazing coffee so what's not to love about Knowledge Perk?! Their customer service is top notch and the atmosphere is relaxing and enjoyable. Give them a try and be sure to take home some of their freshly roasted whole bean! You won't be sorry!
Good coffee & good folks what more could you ask for

I ordered the maple bourbon latte, and it tasted like they forgot to add anything to it. The food was okay. The empanada was overpriced for the size, and wasn't amazing to make up for it. I kinda want my tip back.  Maybe it was the time I went in, but the place had no POC patrons and was fairly full.

The coffee wasn't great. I had tried this place out by recommendation of a family member. I got the pumpkin latte. I'm a Starbucks girl and it just didn't do it for me. I saw all the reviews about family atmosphere and warm greeting the barista was pretty nice and it's a cool spot to hangout but the coffee just wasn't for me.

Latte was nothing more than warmed up milk with barely a hint of coffee. Milk not steamed enough. Not hot. Employees very nice but product failed. Won't go back again for a $6 cup of warm milk.  A bare smattering of items to eat.  Prices high for the 3 baked items available.

Friends don't let friends drink bad coffee, so I always recommend Knowledge Perk. Fun fact, your favorite place probably buys their coffee beans from them! Go to the source, and show some love to Rock Hill's best coffee spot.
Awesome place to get coffee
Best coffee and atmosphere in town.
Super friendly service. Coffee is good. They have some sugar-free options. Great atmosphere for meeting up with friends or having some time to be alone.
Definitely the best coffee shop in Rock Hill.  Great tasting fresh coffee, combined with exceptionally friendly service. Love the atmosphere and positive music that's played.

This is a beautiful place. Bigger than what I expected . The cinnamon roll was very tasty. The coffee is good. But I like the dark roasted coffee in my latte not the light version and I think that's what I got.
Was able to make a frap like keto drink . Pretty darn good beautiful place .
Best coffee and creations ever
Great atmosphere, excellent coffee. Best place in town to relax, or do work while enjoying some nice brew
Very nice and knowledgeable. Nice atmosphere. Very tasty

Nice coffee shop, excellent design, brick walks, coffee roasted inside,great location and service
I got a cortado, it was not bad but for me it was not enough smooth, I meant a texture of coffee and milk
Great coffee. Inviting atmosphere.
The oats are superb.
Doesn't make sense why a coffee place opens at noon.
Great service, excellent coffee. Cool vibe in the shop.
New location in Fort Mill is awesome.  Great look and great staff!
Very good coffee, the flavors were on point! Will definitely be back to try something new

Rude rude service. Sucked all the happiness right out of the room.

None of the options in your response to my review were offered to me. I was told to leave and I would not be given a cup of coffee to go. Oliver was being extremely friendly to everyone. Bringing much needed smiles, as they petted him.

Changing to 3 stars because I respect small business. Still disappointed I couldn't get a cup of coffee.
Friendly staff. Knowledgeable on their products. Will definitely go back

Fantastic atmosphere and even better coffee. They always have the best music playing whenever I come in, and they always have plenty of seating for large and small meetings. I've seen church meetings take place here, small business owners do their work here, and people come just to hang out. Awesome people and friendly staff.

Just moved from another state where there are small coffee shops are everywhere. I fell in love with this one as soon as I walked in! The barista was welcoming and knowledgeable. I will be back!!

The iced lattes taste great.
Best place to write anything from a grocery list to a prize winning novel.
Great coffee. Can get an americano in a ceramic cup. Very nice.
YUM! Got a latte, a muffin, and a spinach feta pastry. Delicious. AND the ambience was amazing. I love the exposed brick walls. Will definitely be back!

Great service and AMAZING coffee. They went out of their way to make a pour over of a coffee off menu that i wanted to try. My wife's caramel lattes was perfectly blended and went great with the freshly iced cinnamon roll!
I love the atmosphere and watching the coffee being roasted. Great seating inside and outside
Great place, great atmosphere and awesome tea!

I decided to change my review after an honest response from one of the owners.
John

I love knowledge perk; it's a great place to go with friends, or to just read/study on your own. Everyone is always so friendly, and the coffee is amazing. I really like their iced caramel latte and the cafe au lait.
love their chai tea latte, they're quick and authentic, way better than starbucks

I had such super high hopes , cool looking place but coffee was lukewarm ( like I could drink it immediately no need for sips , no cool down required ) I ordered a chocolate croissant , was given a cinnamon roll , told staff that and they just kinda said ...oh .. and stood there so I said um a cinnamon roll is ok I guess  15 plus 2$ tip for 2 lukewarm drinks and the wrong food feels totally not worth it . I stood and waited for over 10 min just for my order to be taken and I was the only customer in line ( I forgave that because I believe the order in  front of me was alarge order .
My favorite coffee shop hands down! Me and my friend come here atleast once a week! You can't beat the quality of products and the friendly staff!

All of my experiences have been great so far BUT I need to leave this review to make sure you guys continue in the great service you've shown. Usually my drinks are blended well but today (11-26-21) at 4pm, my drink wasn't that good because the powder substance used in my latte wasn't throughly blended. I drank it anyway but just want you guys to know so you can fix this small issue which could be a big issue to someone else. Thanks!
Never thought a coffee shop would have such difficulty making two coffees. Americano and iced latte took 25 min, and they still didn't get the order correct. No thanks.
Fantastic Coffee and Great staff.. Location is impressive
Consistently great coffee, very reasonable prices. I highly recommend.
Most amazing coffee everytime I come to town I stop by to enjoy this amazing coffee and service is on point
Wonderful Coffee, Amazing Staff, and a very neat little Cafe, inside and out!

A must see and buy if you are in the area good customer service and prices you will love
Please check out Malaysian Lights LLC the best candles in the world from $1 and up
Such a great atmosphere! The coffee is amazing as well!
Enjoyed my tea Au Lait and the chai iced perk! Modern rustic appeal!

Amazing coffee and drinks. They are passionate about 2 things, Coffee and You. The only coffee shop I have been that treats you like family and provides a safe environment to have meets or to do work or just to relax. They have a passion for coffee, you won't be disappointed. They roast their own beans and are always making new roast and striving for excellence.  I highly recommend Knowledge Perk for your next coffee experience.
Great coffee, friendly staff, fun atmosphere.
Wonderful coffee and pastries and excellent service! Everyone was so nice and it was a great environment. They clearly care about the craft of their coffee.

Anyone that knows me knows I love Knowledge Perk. Their french vanilla latte is my favorite coffee drink I've ever had. Their atmosphere has me coming back multiple times a week. I'm moving out of state soon, and honestly will miss Knowledge Perk more than anything. If you haven't tried it yet, you're missing out. I just love this place.
Nice place
Most of the time it's a good place to meet, drink coffee, and work. But Wednesdays, we are ran out by the church service.
Great coffee shop and meeting place.
Good coffee..better than Starbucks in my opinion..nice atmosphere and very nice and friendly crew..they have my business!!
Fantastic coffee! Baristas are very friendly and knowledgeable. The space they have is also really nice, will continue to return many times over!
Delicious pastry. Excellent coffee. Friendly professional service. Great vibe. Love the architectural features. Plenty of seating and a small stage for performers. New favorite coffee spot.

The staff is always so nice and the coffee is great! As is the norm, you pay a little more for the higher quality, but it's worth it. If you can't decide what you want to eat, the cinnamon roll is a popular favorite. My personal favorite is the chocolate croissant. They also have a really good rewards program!
The coffee and interior are wonderful!
My new favorite coffee shop...the muffin was the best I've ever had...looking forward to returning!
Not to be dramatic, but the barista just made me the best iced Americano I've had. 4/5 stars bc my Danish was soft & squishy, not crispy.
Generally love this place for great hot coffees but the iced coffee is weak and badly overpriced for what you get.
Love this place!
Excellent coffee and great vibes!
Great atmosphere, friendly service and most importantly delicious coffee.
Nice looking locatin. Spacious with plenty of seating. Good coffee, but incredibly expensive compared to other coffee shops in the area.
Great hot chocolate...

Gorgeous location and indoor seating, decent service and pretty weak coffee.

I try to find local coffee shops wherever I travel and having a little time before my sons soccer game I decided to take a little time to try a "local gem".  There was a little on street parking in front of the shop but not much.  The other option was the mud pit across the street that screamed "hold my beer and watch this".  I think there was some more parking further past the shop but cannot say for sure.

When we walked in we were in awe of the inside of this place.  It is one of the largest, private coffee shops I've visited.  Plenty of seating and alot of open space.  I checked in on Yelp, as I always do, and noticed a free latte.  When I showed that to the person taking our order she and the gentleman she called over both said they had never seen it before and didn't know anything about it.  They did say they were going to honor the perk but after pointing out that it required a $15-$20 purchase I opted not to use it.

I ordered a cold brew and a chai latte with almond milk.  Both were served correctly as ordered and quickly.  I noticed the cold brew looked like a dark tea and the taste wasn't that far off from a dark tea either.  I take my cold brew black and usually have to water it down because it's so strong however, this tasted very watered down already.  It tasted like what I've made at home and didn't let brew long enough.  I asked the barista if their cold brew normally looked that light and she just said "yes" while walking away.  No concern that I would be asking that question which probably should have raised a red flag.  Next was the chai - equally watered down.  It was pretty much just warmed almond milk.  At this point I just decided it wasn't my day for coffee and let it be.
wonderful
Thanks for treating us today at Atrium Health Pineville! Delicious hot chocolate
The best spot to get a cup of coffee in Rock Hill!
I don't like coffee but the hot coco is good and the manger to my playing card
We got the chai tea latte,iced chai tea, a hazelnut macioto. All were very good. What we liked is the flavor was not over powering! Thank you.
This is a great place for exceptional coffee and tasty pastries. Love the wide open, warehouse that somehow manages to feel cozy.
The coffee is delicious and the blueberry muffin is delightfully sinful.  The service is exceptional and the ambiance is cozy and inviting.  Best coffee house around!!!
Awesome small town shop. Totally unexpected experience. Roaster, roasting classes just a top notch shop. Definitely worth a visit.
Excellent staff, clean, great open concept and vibe. Parking across the street in an unpaved lot.
Nice
I love this place! Today was my first visit amd the atmosphere and the coffee is amazing!!
Very friendly staff and great drink choices
Great product and great sense of community. Thanks for your support of Miracle Park and the local arts.

Great hangout! I love the atmosphere and the garage door opening to bring the outside in. I'm a big fan of the medium roast, but they have some other great drinks too and ever-changing specials. They even have a conference room for rent for a very reasonable rate! Bonus!

THE COOLEST COFFEE SHOP WE HAVE EVER SEEN(having traveled to 30+ countries, it says a lot).   We loved the industrial look of brick, metal, exposed duct work and electrical on the ceiling. They brew their own coffee and you can go watch as they work. Great coffee done as it should be. They also have individual roasters where you can come and roast your own coffee and classes to help you. We were welcomed and given information by Kevin, who is so welcoming and friendly. Just moved to their area; can't wait to make this our regular coffee shop to hang out at.  They normally have live music, but not right now during COVID.
Nice atmosphere, friendly staff, fair prices.
Love this place. Best tasting coffee I've had out of many places I've tried in the Charlotte area. Highly recommend it. I go out of my way just to get a cup of coffee from them, love it!

I imagine the coffee is good but couldn't tell over the amount of syrup in my pumpkin spice latte.  I called back because of it and was told they use 2 pumps of pumpkin and 1of vanilla in a small.  Be forewarned, if you don't like it sickeningly sweet, you may want to ask for less syrup.
Love knowledge perk! Only place I can get an excellent tea latte. The coffe is also wonderful and I highly recommend trying a lavender latte!
A GREAT CUP OF COFFEE!!!

What a great spot! Blake made me the most perfect cup of coffee and served it with a nice smile. Jordon checked in on me multiple times and brought me a water while I worked. Cute boys and cute store.
Great vib and employees are super friendly

Beautiful coffee shop with nice outdoor seating and excellent coffee. Please note that you cannot buy coffee by the pound here. They sell it next door but they do not open til 9am. I unfortunately was there at 7am so I will not be able to return.
The atmosphere is awesome here, the coffee is amazing, and all of the drinks are mixed to perfection. I prefer the iced coffee or cold brew in the summer times and they are all tasty!
It was good we went to eat at the King of  Pizza which was excellent.

Great atmosphere, great service, and seriously great coffee. These people know their beans, they know where they come from, they roast them in house, and know how to serve a mean cinnamon roll as well. Clean, refreshing atmosphere without feeling pretentious or fake, which is refreshing in the world of coffee today. Also love that they ship beans directly from their shop, so I can enjoy great locally roasted beans at home, too.
Always out of something....good cinnamon rolls if you enjoy them served cold.

Best coffee in Rock Hill! Hands down! Their regular brewed coffees and specialty drinks are all delicious! They have lots of indoor and outdoor seating, tables are spread at least 6 feet apart from other tables, and it's very clear which tables are clean and dirty. Very clean and safe! Staff is very friendly and helpful! Don't waste your time going to Starbucks or other chain coffee shops... Come here and support this great local business instead!
I LOVE this place! The coffee is great and the staff is even better. Jack was very helpful and very knowledgeable about the coffee brewing process. My favorite coffee shop in town :)
Great coffee and great place to hang out
Great little coffee spot and friendly staff.

Best coffee place in... everywhere. It's the best ever. I only drink KP coffee, both at home and out. The cafe is so clean, the food is incredible, and the head roaster is a coffee genius. Can't recommend this place enough. Run, don't walk! But don't run with hot coffee, please.
One of the best light roasts that I've had in the long time. It's hard to get beans with this kind of roast without any acidity!  Great customer service. Will be back. Support local!

The customer service was decent and the person who served me was very friendly and informative, however, there were several baristas on staff while the restaurant remained visually dirty. I did not see any employees wash their hands before preparing my food and drink, which is unsanitary and a health code violation. The table I sat at while I waited for my order had a sign labeled "clean" but it was clear due to the crumbs all over the table it was in fact not clean. Normally I wouldn't mind as much about a less than stellar table, but we are still in a pandemic so it's a little concerning regular procedures are not being upheld along with extra cleanliness efforts to prohibit the spread of COVID-19. When I received my latte it tasted very burnt, in fact I was almost certain I had been given decaf instead of regular espresso (I am also a barista so I am very familiar with the difference). Either way, it was not very good and I could only stand to drink about 1/4 of the drink before tossing it out. I had high hopes it would be a great place with great coffee since it was a local company with local roasting. I'm sad to say I did not have a great or even good first impression, apart from the decor itself. I'm not sure I'll be back...

You can go [almost] anywhere for a good cup of coffee these days. BUT if you're looking for a great cup of coffee [or two...or five because you'll want more], this is the place for you. The staff, atmosphere, and passion for coffee here really PERCOLATE the best experience. Just when I thought there'd BEANothing like it, the other coffee shops in the area were [freshly] GROUND to nothing. BOOM ROASTED.
This is my family's new coffee spot! Everyone there is very friendly and the vibe is always nice! 20/10 Reccomend this place for everyone!

It was a rainy Thursday mid-morning when the birds are silent and no one is out - in short, it was a perfect day.

I was lost in South Carolina. If you've never been lost in South Carolina then thank your lucky stars.

I was forlorn but also chuffed with the weather, so I was in a state of confusion when, out of Knowledge Perk, a sweet little thing asked me if I wanted an oat milk late.

Now I've never had heroin ("heron" if you know leetspeak), but I can imagine oat milk is pretty similar.

So put yourself in my shoes. It's a perfect, rainy day and no one is bothering you. And then a percolating hott little thing asks you if you want a beverage that gives you the best high of your life...

GD!
Stopped in for a coffee on 5/11. Our bartisa(o) was very pleasant and fun! Also, an artist in the making. Had a great bear painting for $5. Would totally recommend. Great coffee!

The employees are always super kind and provide an amazing experience! I'm not too experienced in the world of coffee and they kindly suggested great drinks to try! Definitely my favorite coffee shop.

Thank you for being open on Sundays, for having an easy-to-read menu with lovely options, and for being passionate about coffee and customer service. The gentle, upbeat music and spacious atmosphere can't be beat. It was love at first brew.
best coffee in Rock Hill. And they got that oat milk. Yass. Hope they get vegan goods soon, but they do have cool food trucks with vegan options a lot.
Friendly staff, stellar coffee, and very cool atmosphere that celebrates some Rock Hill history.  Highly recommended!

Perfect little coffee shop in the heart of downtown Rock Hill! The coffee is roasted in house and honestly the best in the Charlotte area. The shop is spacious and the atmosphere is cool with a old mill vibe. Go check it out, cool hang out in the heart of Rock Hill.
I love this place! This is one of my favorite coffee shops! Their new expansion has been a great extra feature for customers to come in,enjoy their products, socialize, and relax!
Best shop in town! I would give them more than 5 stars if I could!

Tried this place for the first time this morning and so glad I did. Very nice setting and spacious seating and plenty of outlets if you're bringing a laptop. Seating is limited after 8-8:30am. They do have free WiFi and great coffee which I was super happy about. There's nothing bad about this place and the prices are affordable and they have outdoor seating for the sunny days. Just wish refills was free for regular coffee but still deserves 5 stars

Knowledge Perk is a credit to the community and should be supported! This isn't just a coffee shop - it's a great place for the community to come together and meet. Rock Hill has needed a place like this and it's clear that the owners have gone all in to make this place truly special with a huge investment. I live in Fort Mill and will go out of my way to get coffee here. I'm appreciative to the entrepreneurs behind this place - thank you!

It might possibly be the best coffee in the world. If it isn't they've likely franchised and are now in competition with themselves, as they should be.

The staff is amazing and the Brew is magnificent. I would recommend anyone in town to visit and anyone out of town to make the trek. The ambiance is very inviting and it's a great place for creatives to give their ideas some room to breathe.

10/10 would highly recommend and bring a friend!

It was nice to see this place go from the small shop next door to a beautiful place to visit, sip coffee, and relax. I've purchased several types of whole been coffee and drip coffee here and have not been disappointed. I am grateful to have a place like this nearby. Great selection of pastries too! The salted caramel cookie is my favorite.

The best coffee shop around! They roast their coffee fresh in shop and have excellent food. Atmosphere is perfect. Great place to hang out, study, have a meeting, etc. The back alley has a cool mural and is shared with the businesses next door. The history of the building is really neat too. Customer service is first class. Must try!
This is a beautiful place with wonderful people. I've never been a big coffee drinker, but their products have changed that.

stellar people. stellar coffee. stellar atmosphere. scott was a sheer pleasure chatting with and learning about the offerings of KP (think corporate team building) and history of the wicked cool building. will be returning!
Great people who happen to make Amazing COFFEE!!!!

I was disappointed with the business ethics here. They did not inform us of a water main break.

All I'd ask for is for someone to explain the situation, or warn us, or put up a sign! No one wants to get sick from contaminated water.

Moving forward, please consider this feedback.

***updated***

Although we were from out of town and would have appreciated any sort of in-person heads up, thank you for your prompt reply and explanation. I have updated my review per your explanation.

Loving this place already! It's got such a nice atmosphere although small right now. It's expanding and will definitely be a local hotspot. It's impressive the knowledge they have of coffee and the countries their beans come from. Highly recommend

Knowledge Perk offers a warm and welcoming atmosphere, friendly service, and most importantly,  great coffee. The coffee prices are reasonable, and there is merchandise available. Both, bags and K-cups, are available for purchase.

This place is an excellent choice for your morning brew before work or school.

I love this place so much! This place is like family and alway warm welcome! The coffee is always on point and quality is amazing here with everything they do! I'm excited for the expansion when it opens. This is a must to visit!
Excellent coffee and friendly people!
This is hands down the best coffee in town!

The best cup of coffee in Rock Hill. Roasted fresh in the same room where you get your coffee. Staff is highly personable, passionate, and extremely knowledgeable (no pun intended!). If you ever get a chance to do the immersion experience, don't pass. On top of all of this, they are devoted to being a strong part of Rock Hill's development. Can't wait to see the expansion coming later in 2019.
Awesome staff and coffee enthusiasts to the extreme. If you don't know what to order, don't worry, they got you.
Super awesome people! Lots of positive vibes and wonderful coffee!
I am a Starbucks regular, everyday. I stopped in for a dark roast today to see how it was,  I AM MORE than pleased! Wonderful coffee and nice customer service. I will definitely be back.
Great coffee and customer service!!
Great coffee, great people.
Got some of their coffee for Christmas and it's my new favorite!!!
The guy who owns it is a smexy moyherfer
I love their coffee. I take it to work for my French press and make all of my coworkers jealous.
Wonderful new coffee spot. Extremely enthusiastic and knowledgeable owners. I wish them much success in this new business establishment. Great asset to Rock Hill! Thank you!
Best decaf coffee I have ever had

Hurrah,  perfect coffee and beans in Rock Hill... no more commuting to Charlotte,   wide variety, I choose different with every visit.   Some super premium varieties at reasonable prices.  leans to medium or dark roast, could use some more light choices but that is the trend everywhere.
Pricey but great coffee
Oh so smooth. Can't wait to stop back in.
Had coffee to go because Amalie was closed. Coffee was rich good and deep.too bad no place to sit and read the paper
I actually "tasted" and "enjoyed" coffee for the first time. Knowledge Perk's freshly roasted and ground coffee is an entirely different experience from Box store k-cups and generic creamer.

I happened upon this little gem while traveling from Texas.  Since my visit to Knowledge Perk  I have driven all the way up to Bangor, Maine. My Fiance' and I love coffee so we try to stop for coffee in almost every state we visit. So far we have visited 14 states on our trip and Knowledge Perk has had the best coffee by far.
Nice cup of cold-brew coffee. Check them out.
Fabulous coffee, great service and expertise! Keep your eye on these guys - they have an expansive vision for perking your interest with an immersive coffee experience.
They roast and mix their own beans creating wonderful coffee blends.
The best coffee.
Some of the best coffee I've ever tasted. Try the Sumatra Dark Roast!
Best Coffee!  Really enjoy stopping by and picking up a fresh pound or two to have on hand at home.  Definitely got a great product!  Keep it up!

Absolutely love their coffee... They are a roasting company, and brew their in-house roasted coffee for us to enjoy in the morning. Go grab a cup, and pick up a pound of their 'Disrupt' blend, you'll love it!
Hometown coffee done very well - all with passion to serve and connect with people. According to coffee, I'm friends with this place.
Stop by for a fresh cup of coffee, or delicious cold brew. Run by 2 great guys with a dream to provide the ultimate coffee experience.
Great coffee, great environment.
We are so lucky to have Knowledge Perk!  If you haven't stopped by and met Jonathan, do it immediately. Excellent coffee, excellent place!

I work at Williams and Fudge and bought 2 bags of coffee last week. Just opened it and it is SO GOOD!!!  The customer service was amazing. Both guys made sure I got what I wanted and made sure I was satisfied. Great place! Please check it out!!

Knowledge Perk is a great coffee roaster here in Rock Hill. They roast their coffee in small batches and it is fantastic!!!! Right now they have a small retail space that is open with limited hours. If you're lucky to catch them when they are open pick up some beans, or a cup of freshly roasted and brewed coffee. You won't be disappointed. Their IPO is the most popular, but they also have great Jamaican and decaf available. The decaf is a nice dark roast, so if you like the taste of good coffee without the caffeine then this is for you. It's not a light, watered down decaf, it actually has taste! Can't wait until they open their larger location.
